name: Truce and Trenches
description:
Blue and Red are negotiating an uneasy peace. Trigger-happy troops wait in their trenches, ready to reignite conflict. The player must multitask - type a treaty while pacifying the soldiers.

Can you draft the terms of their truce before the sun goes down or war is reignited?

- Will need UK Keyboard setup

Featured At:
- PC Gamer Weekend (The Common Room, Presented by SEGA)

- Bonus Stage as part of the London Games Festival (Loading Bar Dalston, voted 2nd best game at show)

Have some cool phrases to suggest, submit them here: https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/3QCYHGB

Version 1.6

Changes:
